query:
ALTER TABLE payments 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS mpPaymentId VARCHAR(128),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS mpFee DECIMAL(10,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS paymentTypeId VARCHAR(64),
MODIFY COLUMN status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected', 'refunded', 'partially_refunded', 'cancelled') DEFAULT 'pending',
MODIFY COLUMN paymentMethod ENUM('card', 'pix', 'boleto', 'account_money');
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user Jj8Ug2TBV7Pg37C.root --database cCoaev8yfaEJXZAkd8a56J --execute ALTER TABLE payments 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS mpPaymentId VARCHAR(128),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS mpFee DECIMAL(10,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS paymentTypeId VARCHAR(64),
MODIFY COLUMN status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected', 'refunded', 'partially_refunded', 'cancelled') DEFAULT 'pending',
MODIFY COLUMN paymentMethod ENUM('card', 'pix', 'boleto', 'account_money');
